publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4677# Mrs Nanette Milne: GRIP - Grid Reference Identification Projectâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Maria Murray and ASIRUS (Asthma Support in Rural Scotland), the Scottish Ambulance Service North East Division and Grampian Fire and Rescue Service on the launch of the GRIP - Grid Reference Identification Project which will provide support to individuals considered to be at risk in remote and rural areas; notes that GRIP will provide a system which will help reduce the time required for patients to explain their location in times of emergency when every minute counts, and believes that this project should be adopted across the emergency rescue services to provide further support to asthma patients and others, including diabetic, epileptic, cardiac and anaphylactic patients, in remote and rural Scotland. Supported by: Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Murdo Fraser*, Dave Petrie*, John Scott*, Margaret Mitchell*, Shiona Baird*, Mr David Davidson*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Frances Curran*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4677# GRIP - Grid Reference Identification Project (lodged on 25 July 2006) Robin Harper*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Maureen Watt*
